Topic.Title: More from The GOP War on Women...

Message.Msg: This is from this Sunday's Parade Magazine, the Ask Marilyn column. I think if perfectly describes echo/Ricky, etc. The question: Why do people believe something to be true about a political figure or party, even after they see credible evidence to the Contrary? Answer: You've just stated a fine example of bias, probably caused by an aversion to accepting the likelihood that one can be wrong. Why, if you're wrong about one thing, you might be wrong about other things. It's a scary thought all right, especially if you've built your attitude about life around the philosophy of a particular party. Some people are so biased that they tend to agree with most or all of the positions taken by their own parties, and if you agree with a position taken by a different party, they assume you must be a member of the opposing party. That the epitome of political bias. Meet the echo twins.

Message.Title: Another Fine Weekend...
Message.Msg: ... Information you know you can trust…from jon… a fellow American and outstanding, unbiased citizen, who is a devoted family man and involved member of the community, proud of his self-sacrifice with his relentless volunteer efforts each weekend to the many charitable organizations with which he is involved…just like many of you out there who have enjoyed the weekend with friends, family and …uh, oh, wait a minute here. How many of you were preoccupied over the weekend, with making 36 posts to a stock message board?…that’s right…count ‘em…36. That’s our boy, jon. Let’s see here: Friday night: 8 posts, from about 6:00 p.m. (with more earlier in the day) until about 10:30…hmmm, that puts a pretty good dent in Friday night, although, maybe he’s a night owl. Saturday: back at it at 9:45 a.m., and I doubt the family did much in the way of farmer’s markets, or other autumn events, because from 10 in the morning, until past midnight, jon was very busy, thinking up, putting into words and otherwise creating another 13 posts…that’s right, thirteen, more. Note, that having posted 13 posts over the course of 14 hours, one might have thought he’d have time to spell-check some of them…but, well, that’s jon…writing to the level of the Tea Partiers. Now, Sunday morning, he probably was in church, where he both sings Soprano in the choir, and is the church’s oldest alter-boy. However, he was back at his posting duties by about 3:00, where for the next 8 hours he churned out another 15 posts…that’s right, fifteen more until 11:00 p.m. And keep in mind, all of these are strictly with the retarded jon alias. So, with all of the others, he probably didn’t have time to even eat over the weekend, much less say hello to his family. I suppose many of you find it extremely odd, that a grown man with a family spends each and every weekend sending out anonymous messages to complete strangers. But remember…jon is here only for your best interest. The information he shares with you is timely, relevant and tremendously useful. For example, a few highlights from his 36 weekend posts. “Well .. We elected a ‘cult’ Moos-lem (in denial)” “…try going to a REAL psyciatrist (sic)” (Hey, jon, try going to a REAL dictionary) “…youz is really dum as a doe knob” “how many were ‘waived’ off of the Terrorist Watch List .. so they could come over here and ‘vote’ for Obammy” “…go back to your basement and talk to that "empty chair" (ya chithead)” “remember, racist blame (??) will get you racism back in your face ... I'm your example !!” “…that's fine as longs as no ‘chiggas’ like you come floating by” “ya little two faced jerk !!” “…quit acting like a used rubber ... (snark)” “It's that little glossy ‘comic book’…in two languages (Arabic & Kenyan) - I even had my Moos-lem Brotherhood rush the printing - Signed - B. H. Obammy” “Obama really sucks !!” Jon, you are a true scholar and valuable asset to undecided voters everywhere. Keep up these fine weekend efforts. (Don’t look now, but your family abandoned you several months ago, although I’m certain you’ve been too busy posting to notice. All kidding aside, you probably are, in fact, influencing some voters… influencing them to ask why on earth would they want ignorant, racist fools like you, who have absolutely no life, to be in charge of this country. Maybe next week, you could take some time off…go mow a few lawns, make a few bucks, and go out and get yourself the spelling version of Hooked on Phonics. It’ll be a nice change of pace for you…you’re obviously cracking under the pressure of all that cubicle stress.

Topic.Title: Another Fine Weekend...

Message.Msg: I suppose many of you find it extremely odd, that a grown man with a family spends each and every weekend sending out anonymous messages to complete strangers. And I suppose that you assume a grown man that spends his time tracking the posts of other anonymous messages is completely sane and rational?

Message.Msg: Dear peppeek, I must admit (after reading your post) that my first instinct was to point out how sad and pathetic I find you and people like you, but then I thought about the words that I heard from Tyrone's father George (over the weekend) where instead of lashing out with vitreal or blame, Mr. Woods chose to forgive those who were responsible for the death of his son and pray for a change in their hearts. So like Mr. Woods I choose to forgive you and people like you for your insensitivity and lack of compassion for your fellow man, and pray that God someday will change your heart and help you see the error of your ways. God Bless The Frogg

Topic.Title: ATT retiree benefits

Message.Msg: A follow-up on my original post......I retired from ATT- in Ohio.-2012. Our meeting w/ the union informed us that NOTHING is in place for our healthcare in 2014- the company and the union have agreed to "TALK" about it next fall (2013). How do you think that will go with the contract settled and signed????? Do you really think that any employees on the payroll will stand up for retirees? Not a chance. It's a my, me, world, But wait till they get to retirement age, (if they make it that far). My worst case worry is no benefits or premiums that are so high that your pension cannot cover them. Put your house and money in a trust, go to the hospital like 3/4 of the population, and pay $10 a month toward your bill.......you will get the same care with insurance or no money..... Worked all those years and now they screw us.... cancel your u-verse, landline, and cell/dsl. Sign up with another company. Why support them when they don't live up to the promises of benefits???

Message.Msg: "There is no cover up, never has been, never will be, it's in your imagination." If so, please try to explain why Ambassador Rice who, by the way, is a member of Obama's Cabinet (I'll assume you know what that means) went on 5 networks saying it was not a terrorist attack several days after Obama says he said it was. And for the record, if you listen carefully to what the President said in the Rose Garden he did not say DIRECTLY that IT was a terrorist attack. Rice is not some underling 20 levels below the President who is simply out of control. She was sent out on the media circuit to get the "it wasn't a terrotist attack" message out and she was a good soldier. So, someone of the two if not both are full of it or are simply inept and it doesn't take an overly bright person to clearly see it. Believe what you like, but I'm predicting some heads are going to roll before this one is over. The loved ones of these dead heros are still looking for answers and they are not going to be bought off.
